Package org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.impl

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ArchiveStreamFactory  
    DomainProfileObjectStore
    Maintain a set of domain objects described by a domain profile and allow their properties to be manipulated.
    URIGenerator
    Generate URIs for objects.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnnotationDrivenPackageStateSerializer
    Responsible for (de)serializing annotated fields of PackageState.
    BasicPackageGenerationService
    Basic map-based package generation service.
    BOREMPackageGenerator
    Bagit + ORE ReM package generator.
    DomainProfileObjectStoreImpl
    Implement store for domain objects on top of Jena model.
    DomainProfileRdfTransformService
    Transforms DomainProfile and related classes to RDF and back.
    DomainProfileServiceImpl  
    DomainProfileStoreJenaImpl  
    IpmRdfTransformService  
    IPMServiceImpl  
    OpenPackageServiceImpl
    Service for opening a package.
    PackageChecksumServiceImpl
    Implementation of the PackageChecksumService interface
    PackageImpl  
    PropertyFormatServiceImpl  
    SimpleURIGenerator
    Generate opaque URIs using random UUIDs.
    TestPackageGenerator
    Test package generator
    ZipArchiveStreamFactory  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    StreamChecksumMismatch
    Exception thrown when a stream is read from a package state zip file, and the stream's expected checksum value does not match the calculated checksum.
